price: To će biti zato što su ono što izaziva Allahovu srdžbu slijedili, a ono čime je On zadovoljan prezirali; On će djela njihova poništiti.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱتَّبَعُواْ مَآ أَسۡخَطَ ٱللَّهَ وَكَرِهُواْ رِضۡوَٰنَهُۥ فَأَحۡبَطَ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumu ittabaʿū mā askhaṭa al-laha wakarihū riḍ'wānahu fa-aḥbaṭa aʿmālahum
